caption.p: Heat sealable soluble soybean polysaccharide (SPSS)/gelatin blend edible films for food packaging applications. Film ( A, B) with instant coffee powder and ( C, D) with coconut powder are SSPS/gelatin blend film pouch with weight ratios of 100/0 (S100G0) and 60/40 (S60G40) respectively. ( E) coconut powder in S100G0 pouch and ( F) coconut powder in S60G40 pouch during the dissolution tests in hot water (95 ± 2 °C). Reproduced with permission from [ 30]. Copyright 2020 Elsevier.
